name: Set of 25 or 50 Custom Figure Sketches Note Set
description:
Kristy SKETCHED notes have become a favorite.  She literally sketches a likeness of you to include your favorite outfit, haircut and expression.  

Now we're making it easy to order your very own set of SKETCHED figure notes.  Perfect for expressive personal correspondence or a gift for your favorite letter writer!

BE SURE TO READ BELOW CAREFULLY as there are a few options for you to consider!


S E T     I N C L U D E S:
- One full color digital proof of artwork for approval before final notes are created. (additional edits requested are $25.00 per instance).
- 25 or 50 custom notes printed on smooth white shimmer 100 lb cardstock
- Lined white shimmer envelopes (select liner pattern option below)
- Note sets delivered in a textured white gift box with notes tied up in bakers twine inside.

FOUR SKETCH STYLES TO CHOOSE FROM (select choice below):

Sketch style #1 - THE DETAILED BUST where we feature you from the waist up with detailed watercolor painted moments.

Sketch style #2 - THE HALF FIGURE where we feature you from the knees up with simple watercolor painted moments.

Sketch style #3 - THE SKETCHY FULL FIGURE where we feature you from head to toe in a "Super Sketchy" watercolor style.

Sketch style #4 - THE DETAILED FULL FIGURE where we feature you from head to toe in a more detailed watercolor style.

2   D E T A I L S to be E M A I L E D to hello@shopmomental.com after you place your order:

- Photo/s for artist reference. Be sure to include notes regarding specific clothing and/or other details you wish to 
include.

- Envelope liner choice.  Indicate 1 of 5 choices available:
1. Neon Watercolor
2. Peony Garden
3. Neon Blooms
4. Summer Garden

name: Custom Hand Painted Guest/Memory Book
description:
Delicate watercolor brushstrokes are mingled with detailed acrylic moments in this completely custom guest/memory book.

Perfect to commemorate a milestone event to collect signatures, photos or use as a traditional scrapbook.  Past clients have used books like these for milestone birthdays, anniversaries, weddings and so on.

ARTWORK CUSTOMIZATION INCLUDES:
- One full color digital proof of artwork for approval before final painting is created.  
- Opportunity to customize venue/architecture detail, animals and color palette (select customization options below)
- Custom initials or image "carving" in the tree trunk

BOOK DETAILS:
- 8.75" x 10.25" in size, but not too petite Newbury album from KoloÂ®. 
- Finished with a grosgrain ribbon accent. 
- Built with thick archival board 
- Scored sheets that allow the pages to fold over nicely
- 20 screw bound scrapbook sheets (40 pages)
- Archival / Acid-Free.

name: 3 iPhone Case giftset/wardrobe - choice of 4/4s, 5/5s or 5c
description:
Imagine a lovely wardrobe of iPhone cases to keep for yourself or give as gifts!  

Take advantage of a lower price than if you had purchased separately and the same shipping costs as for just one iPhone case!

Includes 1 of each case in body style of choice:

- Painted Lily of the Valley iPhone Case
- Neon Watercolor Flowers iPhone Case
- Neon Blooms iPhone Case

The beauty of these iPhone cases is that none of the brushstroke's character is lost in reproduction. Subtle variations of color, droplets of paint and remnants of pencil sketch lines can still be seen. No harsh, graphic, digital renderings here. Kristy's artistic iPhone cases are all about distilling the moment when brush hits paper on one of your most beloved essentials of technology.

- Packaged in an original hand watercolored rigid sleeve

- Slim, hard plastic, accessory style case - never bulky but still moderately protective while maintaining access to all ports and sensors
- Glossy finish
- Full color artwork, artist signed
- Available for iPhone 4/4s, iPhone 5(fits 5s) and iPhone 5c (choose style below)

name: Hand Painted Shabby Chic Floral Recipe Box and 50 Recipe Cards
description:
When designing this piece Kristy recalled her mothers shabby recipe box filled with batter stained and dogeared recipe cards.  Nothing can replicate the feeling of pulling out a beloved recipe card and knowing it has been touched and passed through hands over the years.  Let's put away our kitchen iPad stands and get back to making mindful moments with artful pieces like these!

Perfect for Bridal Shower Gifts or Mother of the Bride Keepsakes!  

Each box features lavishly painted peonies, greens and delicate feathers in shades of taupe, blush, ivory and various greens.  Touches of shimmery gold are added throughout.  

Includes:

- Personalization (please email exact spelling of requested personalization to hello@shopmomental.com)

- 50 hand painted recipe cards on softly textured light peach/blush cardstock.  

- Eco-friendly bamboo recipe box with matte polyurethane finish  to give durability to the painted finish. 
- Acrylic recipe protector slides into box top to display while you cook, protecting recipe cards from too many dribbles and splashes. 
- Eight interior dividers categorize recipes.

name: Coral Watercolor Tea Rose 8x10 Signed Print
description:
High quality print of Kristy's original Coral Watercolor Tea Rose artwork.
Lively tea roses were captured in richly hued watercolor tones of crimson, coral and amber. A textured backdrop of taupe brushstrokes reminiscent of impressionistic paintings create a subtle mood that is both warm and cozy.

Looks amazing alone, in trios or mixed and matched with Kristy's other prints available.

- Printed on 100% archival Arches watercolor paper g/m (140 lb)
- 8x10 inches ready for framing (frame not included)
- Shipped flat in protective sleeve with rigid backing

name: Paper Flower and Millinery Bouquet
description:
Kristy has always collected...small bits, vintage ribbons, handmade papers, unique buttons...anything really that catches her eye. Over the years Kristy has amassed a collection of creative inspiration bits that have woven their way into her work time and time again.  

This millinery bouquet combines found vintage items such as millinery velvet leaves, textural puffs, tiny strawberries, petite fabric blooms,paper leaves and ferns, watercolor paper magnolias with button centers and painted details.  Kristy even crafted delicate sweet pea from watercolor paper and strung the tiny blooms to velvet and silk ribbon streamers attached to the bouquet handle.

Truly a sculptural work of art.  

Perfect for the Bride to carry down the aisle or just for display in your Grandmother's cherished heirloom vase.  

- Silk ribbon wrapped handle length approximately 8 inches
- Silk and velvet ribbon streamers at various lengths up to 3 feet.

name: Dahlia and Begonia 8x10 Artist Signed Print
description:
High quality print of Kristy's original Dahlia and Begonia watercolor artwork.
Bold, yet still graceful brushstrokes, paint spatters and richly saturated shades of pink, crimson, soft orange and blue bring this fresh picked bouquet to life.  

Looks amazing alone, in trios or mixed and matched with Kristy's other prints available.

- Printed on 100% archival Arches watercolor paper g/m (140 lb)
- 8x10 inches ready for framing (frame not included)
- Shipped flat in protective sleeve with rigid backing

name: Set of 10 Limited Edition Foil and Watercolor Flat Notes
description:
Succulents and sketchy stripes make this gold foil printed pattern full of quirky personality.  Every note is hand watercolored in shades of sheer neon pink, teal, violet, yellow and amber. 

- A2 (5.5 x 4.25 inch) flat notes on Crane Lettra double thick stock
- Notes will be individually hand watercolored for each purchase.  No two will be alike
- Envelopes in a soft white shimmer with individually hand watercolored liner.
- Wrapped for gifting with a hand painted blush silk dupioni ribbon

categories.name: Limited Edition Hand Watercolored Note Sets

name: Amaryllis and Peony Hand Painted 8x10 Print
description:
Hand painted print of Kristy's original Amaryllis and Dahlia artwork.

This graceful pattern full of lavishly painted Amaryllis, Peony, Garden Roses, Rununculus and various textural greenery are full of elegant whimsy, ready to adorn your walls!

Prints are individually hand painted for each purchase.  Opaque inks in shades of raspberry, pink, crimson and various greens are featured with obvious, textural brushstrokes throughout.

Looks amazing alone, in trios or mixed and matched with Kristy's other prints available. 

- Printed on 100% archival  recycled kraft cardstock 
- 8x10 inches ready for framing (frame not included)
- Shipped flat in protective sleeve with rigid backing

name: Neon Blooms iPhone 4/4s, 5/5s and 5c Case
description: *Presale - iphone case shipping begins on November 4th 2013* Watercolor iPhone case featuring Kristy's original Neon Blooms artwork. A stylized pattern of neon flowers sketched in ink and then flooded with watercolor paint in bold shades of fuchsia, violet, blush and crimson give this stylized pattern loads of personality. Artful use of white space only draws the attention more to all the juicy nooks and crannies of saturated color. The beauty of these iPhone cases is that none of the brushstroke's character is lost in reproduction. Subtle variations of color, droplets of paint and remnants of pencil sketch lines can still be seen. No harsh, graphic, digital renderings here. Kristy's artistic iPhone cases are all about distilling the moment when brush hits paper on one of your most beloved essentials of technology. - Packaged in an original hand watercolored rigid sleeve - Slim, hard plastic, accessory style case - never bulky but still moderately protective while maintaining access to all ports and sensors - Glossy finish - Full color artwork, artist signed - Available for iPhone 4/4s, iPhone 5(fits 5s) and iPhone 5c (choose style below) Click here to read more about our policies and iPhone case designs

name: 2014 Hand Watercolored 9x12 Calendar - Pastel Peony Garden
description:
Calenders are a global icon of rebirth and renewal as each new year approaches. Kristy recalls one of her favorite Christmas gifts each year was a new artist calendar always chosen by her Mom. Kristy has now taken the concept of a calendar and transformed it into a true art piece. Each calendar will be individually watercolored on ArchesÂ® archival watercolor paper for each purchase. No two will be alike and feature glorious characteristics of watercolor like color bursts, wet in wet textures and obvious brushstrokes. See the painting unfold here:

The Pastel Peony Garden pattern features pencil sketch outlines of peonies in various stages of bloom, unripe berries, various greens and vines. - Calendar art created on 100% archival watercolor paper g/m (140 lb) - 9 x 12 inches ready for framing - Shipped rolled in a protective tube
